name: Cauliflower With Green Sauce
keywords: cauliflower, lemon juice, parsley, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 head cauliflower, trimmed and cut into flowerets
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Combine scallions, garlic, parsley, anchovies, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar and olive oil in a food processor or blender and process until finely minced (do not make a smooth puree). Stir in the capers and transfer to a serving bowl.

Steam cauliflower until crisp-tender, about five minutes. Season with salt and pepper and transfer to a serving dish. Serve the cauliflower warm or at room temperature with the green sauce on the side
